views
Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultView
public interface View

This will need to be able to process custom events at some point, when MVC gets running full swing.

Author:
avius

Method Summary
 java.util.List<StateData> getHistory()
          Returns the state history
 StateData getState()
          Returns the latest state we saw
 void initialize(Model m)
          Added to handle issues with constructor orders; the actions performed in the initialize method differ from those in the constructor because these methods rely on the construction of the entire MVC framework, whereas the actions in the constructor only rely on a partial MVC framework (because in there it is still being constructed)
 void log(java.lang.String s)
          Logs the specified string to the display

Method Detail

update

boolean update(StateData data)
Updates the view with the latest chessboard data. Returns true if any changes were made to the view.

Parameters:
data - updated chessboard data
Returns:
true if the view changed

initialize

void initialize(Model m)
Added to handle issues with constructor orders; the actions performed in the initialize method differ from those in the constructor because these methods rely on the construction of the entire MVC framework, whereas the actions in the constructor only rely on a partial MVC framework (because in there it is still being constructed)

Parameters:
m -
